The Twins won tonight. There are plenty of negative takeaways from todays game, but sometimes youve got to win ugly and the Twins did just that tonight.

articles.author: Mark Bowman
articles.title: Charlie Morton strikes out 11 in Braves' walk-off win vs. Giants - MLB.com
articles.description:
ATLANTA -- Instead of enduring what would have been a tough-luck loss, a rejuvenated ﻿Charlie Morton﻿ felt himself soaking in the energy created by the Braves’ second walk-off win within the past three days.

articles.title: Money surely was (and is) a factor for Rob Gronkowski - NBC Sports
